If the creature can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take a number of d12 equal to your level psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until after a short rest.

item.name: Helm of Perfect Potential
entries: This copper-hued helm contains a shard of the Elemental Chaos embedded in its forehead, surrounded by a motif of a rising sun.

entries.name: Enhanced Properties
entries: The helm has the following enhanced properties:

items: Your Dexterity increases by 2, to a maximum of 24.
You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls, and your weapon attacks are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks.
You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.
Your main flaw is amplified.

entries.name: Weapon Perfection
entries: With the helm, you're able to envision new ways to perfectly use your weapons. When you roll to hit, choose from one of the following properties. If you make a successful weapon attack, you may apply your chosen effect.

items: {@b Slow} - The target creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. A creature's speed can only be reduced with this only once per turn.
{@b Push} - Push the target creature up to 10 feet away from you if it is of size Large or smaller.
{@b Vex} - You have advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your turn.
{@b Sap} - The target creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

{@b Gash} - The target must make a Dexterity saving throw equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifer. If the fail, they will take {@dice 1d6} damage if they choose to move on their turn. This effect can stack.

entries.name: Weak Spot
entries: Whenever you roll damage for Sneak Attack, you may roll it a second time and take whichever total.

entries.name: Altered Appearance
entries: While wearing the helm, you can tap it twice to gain the effects of the {@spell disguise self} spell on it to make it take the form of any hat or helm you can envision.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: The helm has 7 charges and regains all charges each dawn. As an action while wearing the helm, you can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 20): {@spell elemental weapon} (1 charge), {@spell call lightning} (2 charges), {@spell wall of fire} (3 charges), {@spell conjure elemental} (4 charges), {@spell wall of ice} (4 charges), {@spell tsunami} (5 charges), or {@spell sunburst} (5 charges). You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additonal charge you spend.

entries.name: Eye of Onos
entries: As a bonus action, you can launch a bolt of searing elemental energy toward a creature you can see within 90 feet of yourself. The target must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 5d6} acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (your choice). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

entries.name: War Magic
entries: Whenever you take the attack action, you can replace one of your two multiattacks with casting a spell that has the casting time of an action.

item.name: Staff of the Elements
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your spells.
The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Elemental Resistance
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against spell and other magical effects.

entries.name: Elemental Affinity
entries: You can choose one damage type when you finish a short or long rest. Spells you cast ignore resistance to damage of the chosen type.

entries.name: Spells
entries: While holding this staff, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: {@spell magic missile} (1 charge), {@spell moonbeam} (2 charges), {@spell rime's binding ice|FTD} (2 charges), {@spell tasha's mind whip|TCE} (2 charges), {@spell fireball} (3 charges), {@spell thunder step|XGE} (3 charges) {@spell raulothim's psychic lance|FTD} (4 charges), {@spell cone of cold} (5 charges), {@spell dawn|XGE} (5 charges), {@spell steel wind strike|XGE} (5 charges), {@spell chain lightning} (6 charges), {@spell disintegrate} (6 charges), {@spell harm} (6 charges), or {@spell crown of stars|XGE} (7 charges). You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
